bioAsHtml: Olivier is a Scala/functional programming enthusiast, back-end software engineer at MFG Labs, Paris. Hi recently discovered the joys and powers of cats/shapeless, and tries apply these concepts in OSS projects on the domain of data validation (jto/validation) and in the Spark ecosystem (adelbertc/frameless).

acceptedTalks.title: Typesafe DataFrame with Spark and Shapeless

bio: Olivier is a Scala/functional programming enthusiast, back-end software engineer at MFG Labs, Paris.
